amendment.description: To express the sense of Congress on damages caused by the regime of Saddam Hussein during the First Gulf War.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1836 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 1836 proposed by Senator Reid. (consideration: CR S12522-12523; text: CR S12522) To express the sense of Congress on damages caused by the regime of Saddam Hussein during the First Gulf War.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1836 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1836 proposed by Senator Reid.
